price: 20. Atondi na nguya kowuta epai na Nkolo ya ngwende ya lokumu.
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
